activities: (1) Personal data received in the course of UnifySquare's activities (such as providing various business services and technical support, enabling sales and other transactions, conducting data analysis to improve products and services, and sales and marketing for products and services), including data related to prospective, current and former customers, suppliers, partners and resellers. (2) Human resources data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline customer, prospect, partner and supplier data; services data; human resources data; services data; including manually processed data
recoursemech: BBB EU Safe Harbor; EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) with respect to human resources data only.
